A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 0007490293, 0007491073, 0007491074, 0007491076, 0007491077, 0007491079, 0007491080, 0007491081, 0007491083, 0007491084, 0007491085, 0007491086, 0007491087, 0007491088, 0007491142, 0007491149, 0007491152, 0007491193.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Westmoreland County (Va.) Records, 1754-1960 circa. Local government records collection, Westmoreland County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Westmoreland County under accession number 51235.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Westmoreland County was formed from Northumberland County in 1653, and part of King George was added later.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Westmoreland County (Va.) Records, 1754-1960 circa, includes Court Records (Judgments and Executions), 1788-1900; Deeds and Wills, 1754-1872; Fiduciary Records, 1780-1830 circa, List of Registered Voters, 1950-1960 circa; Tax and Fiscal Records, 1780-1870.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Westmoreland County is one of Virginia's Lost Records Localities. Additional Westmoreland County Records may be found in the Virginia Lost Records Localities Digital Collection at the Library of Virginia. Search the Lost Records Digital Collection available at Virginia Memory.
